InstructionData.Title: GASMIX2
InstructionData.Author: Unknown
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Gas Mixer Control alias GasSensor d0 alias Mixer d1 alias H2Pump d2 alias H2Sensor d3 alias O2Pump d4 alias O2Sensor d5
alias pressure r0 alias poweron r1 alias temp r2 alias presok r3 alias tempok r4 alias o2ok r5 alias h2ok r6
define MAXPRESSURE 1000 define MAXTEMP 288.15 # 15c define INPUT1 67 define PUMPRATE 10
init: s Mixer Setting INPUT1 s H2Pump Setting PUMPRATE s O2Pump Setting PUMPRATE s GasSensor On 1 s H2Sensor On 1 s O2Sensor On 1 loop: l temp H2Sensor Temperature slt h2ok temp MAXTEMP l temp O2Sensor Temperature slt o2ok temp MAXTEMP l pressure GasSensor Pressure slt presok pressure MAXPRESSURE #s db Setting pressure and poweron h2ok o2ok and poweron poweron presok s Mixer On poweron
l pressure H2Sensor Pressure slt presok pressure MAXPRESSURE s H2Pump On presok
l pressure O2Sensor Pressure slt presok pressure MAXPRESSURE s O2Pump On presok
yield j loop
